name: JBL Bar 2.1 Deep Bass - Sound bar system - 2.1-channel - wireless - Bluetooth - 300-watt (total) - black | Dell USA
description: The elegant JBL Bar 2.1 Deep Bass soundbar features Bluetooth, optical, HDMI in and ARC connectivity with both Dolby Digital and JBL surround sound modes. Its room-filling system power delivers an immersive experience by way of its four powerful full range drivers, two 1-inch tweeters, and JBL engineered 6.5-inch subwoofer. On-board Bluetooth allows you to use the Bar 2.1 for streaming music from your favorite device in addition to its ability to deliver a real JBL theater experience when coupled with your flat panel TV. Its elegant and low profile design will look amazing below your TV.
